General.Name: VM Hotel Acquisition Corp
General.Description: VM Hotel Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting, directly or indirectly, an acquisition of one or more businesses or assets, by way of a merger, amalgamation, arrangement, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or any other similar business combination involving the corporation. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
